diff:
+region      = "eu-west-1"
+environment = "datalake"
+
+dynamodb_table = {
+  name                   = "erasure-requests-dev"
+  billing_mode           = "PAY_PER_REQUEST"
+  hash_key               = "case_number"
+  range_key              = ""
+  point_in_time_recovery = false
+
+  attributes = {
+    "case_number" = "S"
+    "state"       = "S"
+    "created_at"  = "S"
+  }
+
+  ttl = {
+    attribute_name = "ttl"
+    enabled        = false
+  }
+
+  global_secondary_indexes = [
+    {
+      name               = "idx-by-state-and-created-at-dev"
+      hash_key           = "state"
+      projection_type    = "KEYS_ONLY"
+      range_key          = "created_at"
+      read_capacity      = null
+      write_capacity     = null
+      non_key_attributes = []
+    }
+  ]
+
+  tags = {
+    team        = "DE"
+    application = "Request Merger"
+    project     = "Right To Erasure"
+  }
+}
